data_path.label: Data Path
data_path.help: (Optional) The path where device data is POSTed. Default: /reekoh/data

message_path.label: Message Path
message_path.help: (Optional) The path where device messages or commands are POSTed. Default: /reekoh/data

groupmessage_path.label: Group Message Topic
groupmessage_path.help: (Optional) The path where group messages or commands are POSTed. Default: /reekoh/groupmessages
